fields_of_interest: Education and training, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Transport
inter_groups:
Our organization participates in various expert groups in the European Commission and Parliament with the assistance of UNIFE.  
Specific European groups in which we participate:  
FOURTH RAILWAY PACKAGE, STANDARDS AND REGULATION, EU FINANCING FOR RAIL, ERTMS, RAIL SYSTEMS, ENVIRONMENT & SUSTAINABILITY.
eu_initiatives:
The organization has activities in the field of digitalisation. It also works actively in automation, telecommunication and signaling systems. 
The organization has several experts, some of which are civilian contracts. Four times a year, our experts visit forums at http://www.unife.org/ European Railway Industry. This organization participates in expert groups to the European Commission and Parliament. Currently, our organization is in the process of participating in a competition for an expert at the European Commission. Each month they receive UNIFE documents and review texts from European Commission documents. These documents are analyzed and provide our opinion to UNIFE. UNIFE compiles the materials and delivers them to the European Commission. Specific documents on which we have given an opinion: JOINT MOTION FOR A RESOLUTION 4.10.2016 B8-1058/2016 } RC1, COMMUNICATION FROM THE COMMISSION TO THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT, THE EUROPEAN COUNCIL AND THE COUNCIL Towards a robust trade policy for the EU in the interest of jobs and growth,Brussels, 18.10.2016 COM(2016) 690 final, EU-Japan EPA – The Agreement in Principle 6 July 2017, "Berlin Declaration" Joint declaration on industrial policy by Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, France, Germany,Hungary, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Romania, Slovak Republic, Slovenia and Spain on the occasion of the Vth Ministerial Conference of the Friends of Industry June 30th 2017 – Berlin and many other documents.
organisation_name: Association for Railway Automation, Signaling, Telecommunication and Industry (RASTIA)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
industry_forums: Our organization participates in various expert groups in the European Commission and Parliament with the assistance of UNIFE. Specific initiatives are listed in the box above. We take an active part in documents of the 4th industrial revolution in the railway industry - companies from the railway industry.
relevant_communication: On 31 January 2018 in Brussels the leadership of the association attended the annual awards for "The Railman of the Year". On 20 February 2018 in Brussels, we have an invitation and we will be taking part in a debate on "What will bring the UK out of the European Union to the European Railways?" On 21 February 2018 in Brussels, we will participate in a UNIFE meeting attended by representatives of the European Commission.
